TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCLabelAtlas extends Cocos2D.CCAtlasNode implements class Cocos2D.ICCLabelProtocol

Docs.summary: <para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /> is a subclass of <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCAtlasNode" />. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCAtlasNode" />
Docs.remarks: <para>It can be as a replacement of Label since it is MUCH faster.</para><para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /> versus Label:<list type="bullet"><item><description>LabelAtlas is MUCH faster than Label</description></item><item><description>LabelAtlas "characters" have a fixed height and width</description></item><item><description>LabelAtlas "characters" can be anything you want since they are taken from an image file</description></item></list></para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /><list type="bullet"> <item> <description>LabelAtlas is MUCH faster than Label</description> </item> <item> <description>LabelAtlas "characters" have a fixed height and width</description> </item> <item> <description>LabelAtlas "characters" can be anything you want since they are taken from an image file</description> </item> </list><para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /> is MUCH faster than Label</para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /><para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /> "characters" have a fixed height and width</para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /><para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /> "characters" can be anything you want since they are taken from an image file</para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelAtlas" /><para>A more flexible class is <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelBMFont" />. It supports variable width characters and it also has a nice editor. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLabelBMFont" />
